description: os: document FileInfo.Size as system-dependent for irregular files

https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM with my rewriting. state what works, not what doesn't, because the second list is unbounded.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5795059/diff/4/src/pkg/os/types.go
File src/pkg/os/types.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5795059/diff/4/src/pkg/os/types.go#newcode18
src/pkg/os/types.go:18: Size() int64        // length in bytes; system-dependent for device files, directories
length in bytes for regular files; system-dependent for others

subject: code review 5795059: os: document FileInfo.Size as undefined for irregular files
